articles.title: Samsung Launches Galaxy S25 Series Smartphone
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, Galaxy S25+, and Galaxy S25. The new Galaxy S25 series is designed as an AI companion with context-aware mobile experiences.

articles.title: Novo Nordisk's stock rises as Ozempic beat analysts' expectations in sales
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Novo Nordisk's Ozempic sales rose 7% to $4.71 billion in the December quarter, surpassing analysts' forecasts. Wegovy generated $2.77 billion in sales, a 97% YoY increase, but fell short of estimates. Ozempic treats diabetes, while Wegovy is for weight management, both using semaglutide.

articles.title: The best online deals in the Canadian retail space right now
articles.author: Jacqueline Osias
articles.summary: Several companies are offering promotions and discounts on their products and services.  Pandora offers 25% off purchases from Feb 6-17 and DesignMe offers an extra 20% off on haircare sets. Postmedia has launched Your Travel Deals with Priceline Partner Solutions to provide up to 50% off over one million hotels worldwide.

articles.title: Greggs' bold menu shake-up: New flavors ready to rival McDonald's and KFC
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Greggs is launching new menu items starting February 6, 2025, including a BBQ crispy chicken burger priced at £4 and a southern fried chicken goujon wrap for £3.80. These new items will initially be available in 150 stores, with plans to expand to 300 locations by spring, as part of Greggs' strategy to compete with fast-food giants.

articles.title: There's a hidden message in Amazon's event invites
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Amazon is set to launch a new generative AI-powered version of its Alexa voice assistant on February 26th in New York City. The upgraded Alexa will feature new capabilities, including responding to multiple prompts in sequence and acting as an 'agent' for users. Amazon plans to initially roll out the new Alexa to a limited number of users and offer it for free at first.

articles.title: How to get two OnePlus smartphones for the price of one!
articles.author: Michael Bizzaco
articles.summary: OnePlus is offering a limited-time promotion where customers who purchase either the 256GB or 512GB version of the OnePlus 12 will receive a free OnePlus Nord N30 5G. The OnePlus 12 features a Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, a 2K ProXDR display with up to 120Hz refresh rate, and up to two days of battery life.

articles.title: I tried Aldi's new £4.99 hair dupes – my 28-inch locks instantly felt shinier & it saves me time on my beauty regime too
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new hair care products, including the Lacura HR leave-in mask and a hair repair oil, both priced at £4.99. The Lacura HR mask promises to strengthen hair, minimize split ends, and repair damage, while the oil aims to smooth, soften, and add shine while repairing split ends.

articles.title: I tried Aldi's new £4.99 hair dupes – my 28-inch locks instantly felt shinier & it saves me time on my beauty regime too
articles.author: Katy Pagan
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new Lacura HR Hair Repair Leave-in Conditioning Mask and a hair repair oil, both priced at £4.99. The leave-in mask aims to hydrate hair, reduce frizz, and strengthen strands, while the hair oil promises to smooth, soften, and increase shine. Testers reported positive results including improved shine and hydration.

articles.title: Beyond the Brand: Schwarzkopf® Professional
articles.summary: Schwarzkopf Professional, a brand under Henkel, relaunched IGORA VIBRANCE® with expanded shades and more sustainable packaging, featuring Moisture Protecting Complex with AQUAXYL™ Technology. The brand also introduced a diverse OSiS+ ® range of hair styling products. Furthermore, Schwarzkopf launched IGORA® ZERO AMM, a permanent coloration line available in North America, which is free from ammonia and fragrance, and includes Phytolipid Technology and sustainable packaging.

articles.title: Shop Valentine's Day deals on flowers, coffee, jewelry, and more
articles.author: Sarah Saril
articles.summary: Several companies are offering new products and services or discounts for Valentine's Day. Kobo Elipsa 2E, is a device to read books and write notes. Pura 4 Smart Fragrance Diffuser, is a customizable diffuser. Beats Studio Pro x Kim Kardashian are wireless headphones with color curated by Kim Kardashian. Atlas Coffee Club offers discounts on gift subscriptions.

articles.title: Scrub Daddy vs. Scrub Mommy: Which sponge cleans best?
articles.author: Carolyn Forté
articles.summary: Scrub Daddy has launched the Scrub Mommy sponge, an expansion of their brand following the success of the original Scrub Daddy. Both sponges feature FlexTexture foam and are designed for cleaning, with Scrub Mommy offering an additional ResoFoam layer. Testing reveals Scrub Mommy is more versatile for everyday cleaning, while Scrub Daddy excels in heavy-duty scrubbing.

articles.title: This $7 slime-like gel cleans your car's nooks and crannies
articles.author: Izabella Zaydenberg
articles.summary: Pulidiki Cleaning Gel is available for purchase, priced at $6-$7. The gel is designed to clean hard-to-reach places in cars and homes by adhering to dust and debris without leaving residue. It can be reused and features a light, sweet scent.

articles.title: How to Watch the Switch 2 Nintendo Direct on April 2
articles.author: Oscar Gonzalez
articles.summary: Nintendo will reveal details about the upcoming Switch 2 console during a Nintendo Direct on April 2nd. The company is expected to announce the release date, price (possibly around $400), and game lineup, including new Mario titles and potentially Zelda. The Switch 2 will offer backward compatibility with original Switch games and may include upgraded tech specs comparable to a Steam Deck.

articles.title: Aldi's sell-out Stanley Cup dupe is back in shops this week but it's £40 cheaper
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: Aldi is re-launching its Crofton Stainless Steel bottles, a cheaper alternative to the Stanley Cup, in stores this week. Additionally, Aldi is releasing a Ninja air fryer dupe for half the price of the original.

articles.title: Aldi's sell-out Stanley Cup dupe is back in shops this week but it's £40 cheaper
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: ALDI is introducing a Crofton Stainless Steel bottle, a dupe for the Stanley Cup, priced significantly lower at £40 cheaper, available starting February 6. Additionally, ALDI is selling a Ninja air fryer dupe for £39.99, half the price of the original. The store also offers a Gucci Floral's Gorgeous Jasmine scent dupe for £6.99.

articles.title: Nike's ‘Next Generation' Air Max Shoes Are on Sale Now for as Low as $55
articles.author: Kelsey McCarson
articles.summary: Nike is selling the Nike Air Max Nuaxis women's shoes for as low as $55, which is 35% off the original price. The shoes are available in seven different colorways and feature breathable mesh and an Air unit inspired by the Air Max 270. They have received positive reviews for comfort and fit.

articles.title: At Lidl, these cool offers are on the special shelf from Thursday (6.2.)
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Lidl introduces new products including the Lupilu Baby Activity center for engaging fun, the Lidl Plus app for exclusive savings, and the Silvercrest Akku-Hartbodenreiniger for efficient cleaning. Additionally, Lidl is launching the Parkside Steel steps and the Fellowes file shredder, which enhance home organization. These products provide Lidl customers with diverse, innovative, and budget-friendly choices.

articles.title: BOLLE: A Fresh Perspective on No-Alcohol Sparkling Blanc De Blancs and Rose Wine
articles.summary: BOLLE Drinks has launched its non-alcoholic sparkling wines in the US, featuring a unique secondary fermentation process. The company released two cuvées: Sparkling Rosé and a Blanc de Blancs. With an SRP of $29.99, BOLLE aims to be a top choice for restaurants and wine retailers offering exceptional non-alcoholic options.

articles.title: Demand for AI-enabled app security rising in the region
articles.summary: Appknox has launched new AI-driven features to enhance mobile ecosystem protection, offering real-time visibility, automated threat detection, and proactive defense mechanisms. These new features include AI-powered app discovery and inventory management, brand protection against unauthorized apps, AI-driven privacy vulnerability detection, and early identification of security flaws during SDLC.

articles.title: 6 Foodie Products To Serve At An Instagram-Worthy Super Bowl Party
articles.author: John Brandon
articles.summary: Topsail Steamer offers customizable seafood buckets. A company provides soft pretzels baked in Pennsylvania, ready to heat. Another company ships caramel popcorn in flavors like Chocolate Drizzle and a new butter flavor. A company offers cheesesteak flatbread. A company ships frozen wings and drumsticks nationwide, including recipes. A company ships Detroit-style pizza, offering a honey-topped flavor.

articles.title: Amazon's AI revamp of Alexa assistant nears unveiling
articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.summary: Amazon is set to release its upgraded Alexa voice service, powered by generative AI, on February 26 in New York. The service aims to provide more conversational interactions and act as an 'agent' for users, with potential for multiple prompts and personalized recommendations and will be compatible with existing Alexa devices. Initially available to a limited number of users, Amazon is considering a subscription model, while continuing to offer the current 'Classic Alexa' version.

articles.title: Exclusive-Amazon set to release long-delayed Alexa generative AI revamp
articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.summary: Amazon is preparing to launch its new generative AI-powered Alexa voice service on February 26 in New York. The upgraded Alexa will be able to respond to multiple prompts and act as an agent for users, with the company planning to roll it out initially to a limited number of users, with consideration for a $5 to $10 monthly fee in the future.

articles.title: Orange Jordan solidifies digital 'leadership' by launching 'Max it' application
articles.summary: Orange Jordan launched 'Max it,' an All-in-One super app designed to enhance customer experience. The app consolidates services like My Orange, jood, Roamkit, Weinak, and Orange Money into a single platform, offering features like multi-line management and a marketplace for Orange products. 'Max it' has already been launched in several countries and will be expanded soon.

articles.title: The 11 best Valentine's Day flower delivery services that'll arrive on their doorstep by February 14
articles.author: Amanda Garrity
articles.summary: 1-800-Flowers, FTD, ProFlowers and Teleflora utilize local florists to fulfill orders, affecting flower variety and quality. These services aim to match colors and flower varieties, but exact matches are not guaranteed when delivering new bouquets. The reviews assessed bouquets focusing on wow factor, freshness, packaging, and value.

articles.title: Zoho Introduces Zia Agents, Revolutionizing AI-Powered Business Solutions
articles.author: Agnes Ekebuike
articles.summary: Zoho has launched Zia Agents, a new AI-powered tool designed to streamline customer interactions and automate workflows for businesses. This product leverages advanced machine learning and natural language processing to act as virtual assistants. The platform's ability to automate tasks and provide real-time insights is expected to reduce operational costs and improve productivity.

articles.title: This AI Tool Can Help You Create Apps In No Time. This Is Not A Drill
articles.author: Buzz Staff
articles.summary: Replit has launched Replit Agent, an AI tool now available as a free app on iOS and Android, which allows users to build and deploy apps from scratch within minutes. The app supports hundreds of programming languages and frameworks, enabling developers of all skill levels to create applications without needing a laptop. Users have reported creating functional apps and prototypes rapidly using Replit.

articles.title: I was so excited when the first AI Aldi opened on my street – it's much quicker as there's NO tills or self-checkout
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Aldi launched its 'Shop&Go' concept store in Greenwich, London, enabling customers to shop without traditional checkouts via an app-based system that automatically charges their card. This innovative store uses AI and camera technology to track items selected by shoppers. The service has received mixed reactions, with some customers raising concerns about potential errors and access to funds, while Aldi highlights the technology as offering an innovative shopping experience.

articles.title: I was so excited when the first AI Aldi opened on my street – it's much quicker as there's NO tills or self-checkout
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its first checkout-free 'Shop&Go' store in Greenwich, UK. This store uses AI camera technology to monitor purchases and automatically charges customers' cards via the Aldi Shop&Go app. The store requires customers to download the app and register a payment card and also has a pre-payment system.

articles.title: Beauty fans are raving over ‘hair syrup' that takes locks from dry & broken to long & flowing – & it's currently on sale
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Hair Syrup, founded by Lucie Macleod, sells a range of pre-wash oil treatments made with natural oils designed to address various hair and scalp concerns. Their Grows-Mary hair syrup, among others, has received positive reviews for promoting hair growth and improving scalp health. Hair Syrup projects a £3.5 million turnover in the next year.

articles.title: Keurig Dr Pepper Unveils Bold New Flavors Across Iconic U.S. Cold Beverages Portfolio
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP) unveiled its 2025 flavor lineup in the U.S., featuring new offerings for brands such as Dr Pepper, 7UP, A&W, and Snapple. Dr Pepper Blackberry is the first variety to release. This follows the success of Dr Pepper Creamy Coconut and Canada Dry Fruit Splash Cherry, which topped new CSD flavor innovations.

articles.title: This $129 Android phone reminded me of my Google Pixel 9 Pro in the best way
articles.author: Jack Wallen
articles.summary: NUU launched the NUU N30, a $129 Android 14 phone available on Amazon. The phone features a 6.7-inch HD+ display, octa-core CPU, 6GB RAM, 128GB storage, a 50MP AI-powered main camera, and a 5000mAh battery.

articles.title: The best Wyze Cam alternative I've tested is only $20 with this deal
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: Blink has launched the Blink Mini 2, an upgraded security camera with weather resistance for indoor/outdoor use, person detection, and a spotlight. It improves upon the original Blink Mini with enhanced features and is positioned as a competitor to the Wyze Cam v3. The Blink Mini 2 is priced at $40 on its own or $50 bundled with a weather-resistant power adapter.

articles.title: Amazon is holding a devices event on February 26
articles.author: Kris Holt
articles.summary: Amazon will host a devices event on February 26th, where they are expected to unveil the next-generation Alexa. Alongside this, new audio gear such as Echo speakers and Echo Buds are also anticipated to be introduced. The event may also disclose the pricing model for a subscription to this enhanced version of Alexa.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a 'lightweight' $200 cordless pressure washer for $66, and shoppers say it's 'small yet mighty'
articles.author: Victoria Garcia
articles.summary: Nexpow has launched a Cordless Pressure Washer, now on sale at Walmart for $66. This portable device features a 300W brushless motor, a maximum pressure of 1,000 PSI, and a rechargeable 48V battery lasting up to 50 minutes, making it suitable for cleaning cars, patios, and other outdoor surfaces.

articles.title: Samsung's bold move: charging top dollar for a ‘lesser' S Pen
articles.author: Bryan M. Wolfe
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Ultra with an updated S Pen. The new S Pen lacks Bluetooth functionality, resulting in the removal of features like Air Actions, but is lighter and doesn't require charging. The Galaxy S25 Ultra, along with the Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus, will be available in stores starting February 7, with preorders currently open.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 takes on Apple with bargain tablet offer
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a deal on a tablet. Customers reviewed Samsung tablet mentioning its performance and bloatware. Lenovo tablet is available at a cheaper price.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans set to love ‘stylish' new Stanley dupes – and they come in three colours
articles.author: Jamie Smith
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching stainless steel bottles for €7.99, a dupe for Stanley's Quencher, featuring three drinking positions and various colors. Also, Aldi is introducing matching kitchen staples, including a kettle and toaster, in three different colors, with prices starting from €14.99.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer's 'interesting' new blouse for £37 shoppers call 'sheer perfection'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new Polka Dot Puff Sleeve Blouse for the spring/summer season. The blouse features a regular fit, voluminous puff sleeves, a round neckline, and bows at the front. Shoppers are responding positively to the design and fit.

articles.title: BLANCO to Unveil Next-Generation Innovations and Refreshed Brand Identity in Honor of 100th Anniversary at KBIS 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: BLANCO is celebrating its 100th anniversary with a product debut. The company marks this milestone as a pivotal moment in its evolution as a leader in kitchen water place solutions.

articles.title: Lynx tops up Fine Fragrance Collection with five more variants
articles.author: Daniel Selwood
articles.summary: Unilever is expanding its Lynx Fine Fragrance Collection with five new body sprays, a stick deodorant, and a shower gel.  Lynx also launched Sunset Fresh, a new variant for its core deodorant lineup. Additionally, Unilever introduced a premium deodorant range under the Sure, Sure Men, and Lynx brands suitable for sensitive areas, supported by marketing investments.

articles.title: Amid AI Boom, Tech Expert Says Companies Must Own Their Brand Voice
articles.author: Lauren Giella
articles.summary: Maesa leveraged generative AI to create a marketing campaign for its fragrance brand, Fine'ry. This initiative aimed to highlight the brand's mission of offering high-quality fragrances at accessible prices. By using AI to create marketing content, Maesa reduced costs and increased content output.

articles.title: Mo Abudu Launches Naija Creates to Elevate Nigerias Creative Economy
articles.author: Bellanaija
articles.summary: Mo Abudu launched Naija Creates, a new platform designed to showcase and monetize Nigeria's creative talent on a global scale. The initiative aims to transform Nigeria's creative industries into a significant economic force, building on initiatives like Lagos Canvas.

articles.title: Want Google One AI Premium For 50% Less? Verizon's Got You...
articles.author: Richard Goodwin
articles.summary: Verizon has partnered with Google to offer Google One AI Premium subscription to its mobile and home internet customers at a discounted price of $10 per month. This subscription includes access to Gemini Advanced, AI tools for Gmail and Docs, and 2TB of cloud storage. The offer is valid until November 15, 2025 and auto-renews at $19.99/month after the trial period.

articles.title: Rezolve Ai Kicks Off 2025 with Major Retail Expansion as Leading Brands Leverage Its ...
articles.author: Rezolve Ai Ltd
articles.summary: Rezolve Ai's AI-driven technology is now being used by brands like Dunkin', BJ's Wholesale Club, Discount Tire, Philz Coffee, Phoenix Suns, and Coles Supermarkets to improve customer engagement and operational efficiency. Rezolve Ai's technology is being utilized on over 16.2 million mobile devices monthly across 1.1 million locations.

articles.title: quip Revolutionizes Oral Care with Launch of Ultra, its First Professional Grade Sonic Toothbrush
articles.author: Quip
articles.summary: Quip has launched the quip Ultra Next Generation Smart Sonic Toothbrush featuring an EasyClick Brush Pod, which reduces plastic waste by 70%. The quip Ultra boasts 15x more plaque removal and 2x more whitening within one week and includes a 30-day battery life, app connectivity for habit tracking, and a customizable LED touch bar.

articles.title: Genpact Accelerates Innovation through Service-as-Agentic-Solutions
articles.author: Genpact
articles.summary: Genpact launched its Agentic Solutions, a Service-as-Agentic-Solutions offering, to accelerate innovation for enterprises. This new service aims to shift business operations from traditional linear models to autonomous agent-led delivery.

articles.title: Landus and TalusAg Deliver First Local Green Ammonia Production in North America
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Landus, in partnership with TalusAg, has initiated commercial production of green ammonia using modular systems in North America. This development provides American farmers with a cost-competitive, reliable, and sustainable fertilizer supply.

articles.title: B&M's 'brilliant' £16 service you'll never see in any of its stores
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: B&M launched an online flower delivery service, offering bouquets for various occasions, including Valentine's Day. Customers can order flowers online with options for add-ons like teddy bears and chocolates, with prices starting from £15.99. The service also includes a subscription option for monthly deliveries at £16 a month.

articles.title: The £6.99 cheap Aldi perfume that scent fans are raving about as it one of the best dupes for a £76 Gucci buy
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new fragrances under the Lacura brand, positioned as affordable dupes of high-end perfumes. Lacura Meadow Bouquet is presented as an alternative to Gucci Floral's Gorgeous Jasmine, while Lacura Classic Italia is compared to Victoria Beckham's Portofino '97 Eau de Parfum. The new fragrances are available in Aldi stores at a significantly lower price point than the designer originals.

articles.title: The £6.99 cheap Aldi perfume that scent fans are raving about as it one of the best dupes for a £76 Gucci buy
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new affordable fragrances, including Lacura Meadow Bouquet priced at £6.99, which is considered a dupe for Gucci Flora Gorgeous Jasmine. Additionally, the Lacura Classic Italia fragrance, also priced at £6.99, is being compared to a Victoria Beckham perfume. These new perfumes are available in Aldi UK stores.

articles.title: B&M shoppers rush to buy 'genius' new bargain home product that's 'such a great idea'
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: B&M launched new wireless, battery-operated table lamps priced at £12. These lamps come in sage green or black base options with a linen-look shade and require three AA batteries, offering a cordless lighting solution for homes.

articles.title: Debenhams offering top-rated vacuum cleaner for less than half price
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Debenhams has significantly reduced the price of its Alivio Wet and Dry Vacuum Cleaner to £44.99. Shark is offering discounts on its Anti Hair Wrap Cordless Pet Vacuum, now priced at £189.99. Amazon's Basics Cylinder Bagless Vacuum Cleaner is available for £49.99, featuring a triple-action nozzle and an anti-allergen filter.

articles.title: Leap Into the Future of Smart Cleaning With Dreame X50 Ultra
articles.author: Neeraj Paruthi
articles.summary: Dreame is launching its latest flagship robot vacuum, the X50 Ultra, on February 14, 2025. The X50 Ultra features include ProLeap™ System, VersaLift™ Navigation, HyperStream™ Detangling DuoBrush, and an AceClean™ DryBoard. It will be available on the Dreame official website and Amazon for $1699.99, with presale offers available.

articles.title: Don't Miss Last Minute Super Bowl Deal on Neo QLED 4K TV
articles.author: Alfred Custodio
articles.summary: Samsung's Neo QLED 4K (QNX1D) television is available with significant discounts across various models. The television features Quantum Matrix technology, Neo Quantum HDR, Dolby Atmos, and Motion Xcelerator Turbo, enhancing the viewing and audio experience. It also utilizes the Samsung Tizen OS for easy access to streaming and apps.

articles.title: Lidl's Aesop dupe hand-wash looks like luxury and it's only £2.54
articles.author: Ashley Bautista
articles.summary: Lidl has launched a new range of luxury hand-wash called 'Deluxe Aromatic Handwash' available in two scents, Terreuse and Revigorant, for £2.99 per 500ml bottle. Lidl is also offering a Body Cleanser for the same price, available in two scents: Adoration and Admiration. The Deluxe Aromatic Handwash is available in stores now.

articles.title: Trang Pham and Thien Olson
articles.summary: Trang Pham launched a new Eggroll Ladies café in the Equitable Building. Thien Olson acquired WeWash Laundry, a full-service laundry and delivery system, and is expanding its services to Van Meter.

articles.title: Fizz TV: New 100% customizable digital TV experience now available in Québec Français
articles.author: Fizz
articles.summary: Fizz has officially launched Fizz TV, a fully customizable and affordable all-digital television service for Québec customers. The basic package includes 23 channels, and members can add 5 to 20 specialty channels of their choice with an introductory price of $7 for a limited time. The Fizz TV app allows members to pick channels from over 100 options and start watching without installation, offering live, catch-up, and on-demand viewing on various devices.

articles.title: mysherpas Unveils Patented AI-Driven Lending Platform, Defining a New Technology Category in Commercial Lending
articles.author: mysherpas
articles.summary: mysherpas launched a new category-defining lending platform designed to enhance collaboration, secure data management, and eliminate inefficiencies. The launch includes a new brand identity and a redesigned website, reinforcing mysherpas' commitment to automation and data security in lending operations. The new platform is designed to give early adopters a competitive edge.

articles.title: B&M asks 'did you know' as fans wowed by little known £16 Valentine's Day offer
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: B&M introduced a fresh flower delivery service, allowing customers to order bouquets online for home delivery, starting at £15.99. The service includes options to add gifts like teddy bears and chocolates. Additionally, B&M offers a flower subscription service for £16 a month.

articles.title: Amazon ditches Fire TV Stick feature without warning and customers are fuming
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Amazon's Fire TV Stick devices have had the 'Hide Apps' feature removed due to a recent Fire OS update. This change, affecting models like the Fire TV Stick Max and 1st-gen Fire TV Stick 4K, prevents users from decluttering their home screen by hiding pre-installed apps, leading to user dissatisfaction.

articles.title: FY Ads Singapore: Powering PS Café's Success with Strategic Xiaohongshu Marketing and Meituan Dianping Marketing
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: FY Ads Singapore assisted PS Café in enhancing its presence on Xiaohongshu and Meituan Dianping to target the Chinese market. The strategies involved customized Xiaohongshu marketing to engage younger consumers and boosted presence on Meituan Dianping to attract Chinese tourists and locals, strengthening PS Café's digital presence in China.

articles.title: Crease be gone – Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 said to be almost crease-free
articles.author: Sam Cross
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7 is rumored to feature a significantly reduced screen crease due to a new hinge design and durable glass, possibly incorporating learnings from the Galaxy Z Fold 6 Special Edition. Additionally, the phone is expected to include a larger vapor chamber for improved cooling.

articles.title: GPTBots.ai Integrates DeepSeek's Janus-Pro, Elevating AI Image Generation for Enterprise Applications
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: GPTBots.ai has integrated DeepSeek's Janus-Pro into its platform as an Open Tool. Janus-Pro is DeepSeek's image model, known for hyper-realistic outputs and contextual understanding. This integration enhances GPTBots' AI capabilities, streamlining visual content creation for businesses.

articles.title: "This is Genuine": Mzansi Woman Gifts Her Uncle a Brand New Phone in Heartwarming Video, SA Loves It
articles.author: Johana Mukandila
articles.summary: A woman gifted her uncle a new phone. The video of the interaction gained traction online due to its heartwarming nature and the uncle's emotional reaction to receiving the gift.

articles.title: 'I've found the best foundation for pigmentation'
articles.author: Charley Williams-Howitt
articles.summary: Dior has launched the new Dior Forever Hydra Nude Foundation, which claims to offer 24 hours of natural perfection and 48 hours of hydration. This foundation contains 55% water and hyaluronic acid, providing a lightweight, skin-blurring, and hydrating effect with medium to full coverage in 18 shades. While it effectively disguises discoloration and evens skin tone, some fading may occur on oilier skin areas by mid-afternoon.

articles.title: Samsung's Tri-Fold Smartphone: Release Date, Features, and Competition
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy G Fold, a tri-fold smartphone anticipated to have a 10-inch screen, possibly in early 2026. This launch aims to solidify Samsung's dominance in the foldable market before Apple releases its rumored foldable iPhone.

articles.title: Samsung S25 సిరీస్‌లోనే ఉండే గేమ్ ఛేంజింగ్ ఇన్నోవేషన్స్ ఏంటో చూసెయ్యండి..
articles.summary: The Samsung S25 series features 5 game-changing innovations. These advancements position the series as a must-have product for consumers.

articles.title: Offaly company invests €2.4 million in new generation heat pump designed for Irish climate
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Grant, an Irish heating technology leader, has launched its new-generation air source heat pump, the Aerona R290, with a €2.4 million investment. The Aerona R290 utilizes the environmentally amiable refrigerant R290 and includes the aerona Smart controller and QR Smart Pre-Plumbed awave Integrated Cylinder.

articles.title: Turn your upgrade dreams into reality with Samsung's Blue Tag Sale
articles.author: Times LIVE
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Blue Tag Sale, offering discounts on various products including refrigerators. Customers who purchase select Samsung fridges will receive a complimentary Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE 5G. The sale is valid until March 2, 2025, with a redemption deadline for the free tablet set for March 31, 2025.

articles.title: AppSecure Security Partners with Jazzee AI to Bolster US Market Expansion
articles.summary: AppSecure Security has partnered with Jazzee AI to boost customer acquisition in the US market and complement Jazzee's security offerings. This partnership integrates AppSecure's offensive security expertise with Jazzee's AI-driven SaaS marketplace, offering US enterprises a comprehensive solution for securing digital assets and utilizing trusted SaaS tools.

articles.title: Samsung's revamped Galaxy AI is the highlight of the S25 series. Here's what I think having used it for a week
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 series with revamped Galaxy AI features. The new AI tools offer enhanced voice commands, improved photo editing, smarter search capabilities, and features like Now Brief and AI Select, designed to streamline daily tasks. While not flawless, Galaxy AI presents a versatile and practical upgrade to the user experience.

articles.title: Nomad Internet Launches Nomad Dragon- The Best Verizon Modem on the Planet
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Nomad Internet has introduced the Nomad Dragon modem, designed to provide reliable and high-speed internet access to rural communities. The Nomad Dragon features a built-in battery backup for uninterrupted connectivity and is offered for free with Nomad Internet's unlimited internet plan for a limited time. It aims to bridge the digital divide by empowering rural residents with access to education, healthcare, and economic opportunities.

articles.title: Nomad Internet Launches Nomad Dragon- The Best Verizon Modem on the Planet
articles.author: Nomad Internet
articles.summary: Nomad Internet has launched Nomad Dragon, a Verizon modem that offers high-speed internet connectivity and up to 10 hours of battery backup. The Nomad Dragon can accommodate up to 128 devices and comes with network security capabilities and is being offered for free with Nomad Internet's unlimited internet plan for a limited time.

articles.title: 32 Ingenious Target Products That'll Make Your Life A Heck Of A Lot Easier
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: The article features a curated list of products, including the Sonos Era 100 wireless smart speaker that adapts sound based on room acoustics. It also highlights the introduction of the Pick-Up Bricks toy vacuum that encourages children to clean up toys and cleaning accessories like Clorox daily shower spray.

articles.title: Samsung is handing out free Galaxy S25 upgrades - but you have to beat this date
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Samsung announced its newest Galaxy S25 series last month, featuring improved software, battery life, and screens. Samsung is offering double storage for a limited time. Mobiles.co.uk offers deals on the S25 and S25 Ultra with pre-orders ending on February 6.

articles.title: AI vs. Designers: The Battle for the Future of Graphic Design
articles.summary: The graphic design industry is experiencing a transformation with the introduction of AI tools like Adobe Sensei, Canva's AI-powered design suggestions, Midjourney, DALL·E, and Runway ML. These AI platforms are generating professional work, impacting design workflows and the creation of logos, posters, and social media graphics.

articles.title: ChatGPT Parent OpenAI Rebrands To Reflect A More 'Human' Future
articles.author: Shomik Sen Bhattacharjee
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a rebranding initiative on Tuesday, introducing a new logo and typeface.

articles.title: ଭାରତରେ ଏହି ଦିନ ଲଞ୍ଚ ହେବ iQOOର ନୂଆ ଫୋନ; ମିଳିବ ଆକର୍ଷଣୀୟ ଡିଜାଇନ
articles.author: ETV Bharat
articles.summary: iQOO is preparing to launch a new phone in India called iQOO Neo 10R on March 11. The CEO of iQOO India released a teaser of the iQOO Neo 10R on social media platform X, revealing the launch date.

articles.title: Nestlé, Dubai AI Campus to develop AI tool to drive F&B innovation
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: Nestlé has partnered with Dubai AI Campus to develop an AI-powered tool. This tool is designed to identify emerging product innovation opportunities by analyzing consumer trends, aiming to accelerate product development and meet evolving consumer demands in the Middle East, Africa, and Asia.

articles.title: Fujitsu to highlight AI-powered network technologies at MWC Barcelona 2025
articles.author: Fujitsu Limited
articles.summary: Fujitsu Limited will participate in Mobile World Congress Barcelona 2025 (MWC25) under the theme "Boundless Potential." At the congress Fujitsu will unveil its latest advancements in network technologies and enterprise solutions. The company will also highlight how AI is revolutionizing networks and driving business transformation.

articles.title: OpenAI unveils a visual rebrand, featuring a new bespoke typeface called OpenAI Sans, a refined logo, and a new color palette (Jonathan Bell/Wallpaper*)
articles.author: Techmeme
articles.summary: OpenAI has unveiled a visual rebrand, featuring OpenAI Sans, a refined logo, and a new color palette. These changes represent a comprehensive update to how OpenAI presents its technology and services.

articles.title: There's an unfortunate catch to the latest Kindle alternative
articles.author: Pocket Lint
articles.summary: Bookshop.org has launched a new Kindle alternative accessible on smartphones and tablets, providing an alternative platform for reading digital books.

articles.title: 37 Products To Help With Boob Sweat, Ingrown Hairs, Blackheads, And Other Oh-So-Human Problems
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The article highlights several new beauty and personal care products available on Amazon. These include Dr. Tung's tongue scraper for breath improvement, a tonsil stone remover with an LED light, Mouthwatchers manual flossing toothbrush, and Revlon oil-absorbing volcanic face roller.  Additionally, the article mentions Intimate Rose's Kegel weights to help strengthen the pelvic floor.

articles.title: Rolls-Royce introduces ‘immersive' in-car fragrance technology
articles.author: Eddie Cunningham
articles.summary: Rolls-Royce has developed 'Rolls-Royce Scent', an 'immersive fragrance' to complement the aromas in its cars. An in-house perfumer composed the scent which combines notes of amyris, cedarwood, rosewood and iris. The technology releases fragrances subtly for a long-lasting and 'consistent experience'.

articles.title: Shoppers go wild for Kmart's ‘genius' $5 kitchen gadget
articles.author: Eleanor Katelaris
articles.summary: Kmart has launched a new chicken shredder priced at $5, designed to simplify shredding cooked meat. The device has garnered significant attention from shoppers and is being touted as a 'must-have' for meal prepping due to its ease of use and time-saving benefits. Initial reactions are largely positive, with many users praising its convenience and effectiveness.

articles.title: Aldi selling Ninja Air Fryer dupe for half the price of original with £50 saving – and it's in stores this week
articles.author: Sophie Warburton
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a new Air Fryer With Window for £39.99, featuring a 4.8-liter capacity, 12 preset programs, a viewing window, a digital timer, and variable temperature control. This product rivals Ninja Kitchen's Air Fryers, including the AF100UK model, which sells for up to £270. Aldi also released an XXL air fryer with double-compartment design and 10 pre-set programs for less than £70.

articles.title: Pre-order Samsung's new Galaxy S25 and get up to $1,250 in savings
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 smartphones, including the S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra models, and is offering pre-order bonuses. These bonuses include discounts, trade-in credits, and Samsung Credits. The smartphones feature the latest processors, AI integration, advanced cameras, and improved battery life.

articles.title: Pre-order Samsung's new Galaxy S25 and get up to $1,250 in savings
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Galaxy S25 smartphones, offering pre-order benefits including a $50 Samsung reserve credit. The Galaxy S25 lineup features a sleek design, advanced processor, intelligent AI integration, and a cutting-edge camera. Pre-order benefits include discounts, trade-in credits, and deals on other Samsung Galaxy devices, with estimated shipping from early February to early March.

articles.title: Pre-order Samsung's new Galaxy S25 and get up to $1,250 in savings
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Galaxy S25 smartphone series, which includes the Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra. The devices feature a modern design, a powerful processor, AI integration, and an advanced camera system. Pre-orders are currently available with exclusive bonuses like discounts, trade-in credits, and Samsung credits.

articles.title: The Economics of Digital Product Innovation
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: In 2006, Microsoft launched Zune as an MP3 player competitor to Apple's iPod. However, the Zune failed within five years due to a lack of network effects and ecosystem. The article also highlights the launch of other new digital product such as Apple Watch, Amazon Fire Phone and Microsoft Teams.

articles.title: DeepSeek disruption: Lessons for business firms and nations
articles.summary: DeepSeek, a Chinese open-source AI company, launched a free and open-source large language model. This new solution is more energy-efficient and requires less hardware than existing solutions, disrupting the market. The launch of DeepSeek has impacted leading software and hardware vendors.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer has launched a Suede Tote Bag that is the ultimate back to ...
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: M&S features a Suede Tote Bag. The bag is generating interest as a desirable item.

articles.title: Verizon Makes $120 Google Offer To Android And IOS Users
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Verizon has reduced the price of Google's cloud storage subscription. This price adjustment represents an update to the existing service, potentially impacting its availability and appeal to customers.

articles.title: M&S launch knitted jacket that's perfect for winter & spring – it's already a bestseller ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: M&S has launched a new knitted jacket, which is already a bestseller. The jacket is available in lilac and described as soft, warm, and suitable for wear with wide-legged trousers.

articles.title: This new NJ food might become a Jersey tradition
articles.author: Dennis Malloy
articles.summary: Tony Baloney's has launched a new product called Mad Mutz, a line of pre-packaged, breaded mozzarella sticks in diverse and creative flavors, including Cacio Pepe, Unicorn, and Lucifer. Introduced last fall, Mad Mutz is available online and in supermarkets, made in Mike's facility in Atlantic City.
